ModMetaData.name: Skulls From Cremation
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds two recipes to the crematorium, both of which provide a skull when a humanoid corpse is destroyed; one will auto strip the corpse while the other won't. Handy for building all those skullspikes you need to keep those pesky slaves in line.
Will not work on animal corpses.
